Title: Extreme heat alerts and impacts across Mozambique 2016 2022 : gathering evidence from media articles Carolina Pereira Marghidan1 , Maarten van Aalst1,2,3 , Justine Blanford1 , Genito Maure4 , and Tatiana Marrufo5 1 Faculty of Geo Information Science and Earth Observation ( ITC ) , University of Twente , Enschede , the Netherlands 2 Red Cross Red Crescent Climate Centre , the Hague , the Netherlands 3 International Research Institute for Climate and Society , Columbia University , United States of America 4 Eduardo Mondlane University , Department of Physics , Mozambique 5 National Institute of Health , Mozambique Correspondence : Carolina Pereira Marghidan ( c.pereiramarghidan @ utwente.nl )
